mapper.select: SELECT test_title testTitle, p.question_no questionNo, question_idx questionIdx, answer, example_idx exampleIdx, example_ox exampleOx FROM paper p JOIN question q ON p.question_no = q.question_no JOIN example e ON q.question_no = e.question_no JOIN test t ON q.test_no = t.test_no WHERE student_no = #{studentNo} AND t.test_no = #{testNo} AND example_ox = '정답' ORDER BY question_idx, example_idx
SELECT test_no testNo FROM question q JOIN paper p ON q.question_no = p.question_no JOIN student s ON p.student_no = s.student_no WHERE p.student_no = #{studentNo} GROUP BY test_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paper(question_no, student_no, answer) VALUES(#{questionNo}, #{studentNo}, #{answer})
